summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the construction and acquisition of the extension to the existing Fremont substation for transforming additional kilowatts of electric energy, out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52898, and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
